name: Interaction
comment: Records the communication between the CSR and a contact, where the contact represents a customer or a prospect.
vf short description: Records the communication between the CSR and a contact, where the contact represents a customer or a prospect.

fields.name: InteractionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: InteractionKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier to represent the interaction in ALDM. Each interaction  key value represents a unique interaction with prospects or contacts. Generated Key based on Interaction Id

fields.name: ContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionChannelMediumInd
fields.comment: Specifies the communication medium on which the interaction had taken place.

fields.name: StartTime
fields.comment: Indicates the start date and time of the interaction. partyInteraction.interactionDate.startDateTime

fields.name: EndTime
fields.comment: Indicates the finish date and time of interaction. partyInteraction.interactionDate.endDateTime

fields.name: InteractionDuration
fields.comment: Specifies the duration of the interaction. The duration is calculated in seconds. Extract in seconds from (nvl(partyInteraction.interactionDate.endDateTime,sysdate) - partyInteraction.interactionDate.startDateTime)//Notes: NVL is done to prevent setting duration as null, when endDateTime isnt available.

fields.name: InteractionId
fields.comment: Unique identifier to represent the interaction in the source system. partyInteraction.id

fields.name: InteractionNote
fields.comment: Notes describing additional information about an interaction. Fetch partyInteraction.note.text where partyInteraction.note.date is the latest.

fields.name: InteractionDirectionInd
fields.comment: Specifies the direction of the interaction. For example, Inbound, outbound. partyInteraction.direction

fields.name: InteractionSummaryNote
fields.comment: Specifies the interaction summary. partyInteraction.description

fields.name: AuthenticationFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the interaction has been authenticated.Values are:- 1 - Interaction has been authenticated.- 0 - Interaction has not been authenticated.

fields.name: InteractionPayOptionInd
fields.comment: Indicates the payment type for the interaction.For example, non-billable, contract, incident and pay-per-call.

fields.name: InteractionSessionStartDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date and time when the interaction has been created. This is the user start time for an interaction. partyInteraction.interactionDate.startDateTime // Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation

fields.name: InteractionSessionEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date and time when the interaction has been completed. This is the user end time for an interaction. partyInteraction.interactionDate.endDateTime // Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation

fields.name: InteractionSessionDisconnectDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date and time when the user got-off the media, such as phone, email, or chat, during an interaction.This is the start time for the wrap-up.

fields.name: InteractionChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: WebUsageSessionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AppUsageSessionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: SubscriberConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MarketSegmentSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ContactMethodSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CallCenterSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OriginatorContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionCreationDate
fields.comment: Date and time when the party interaction was created. partyInteraction.creationDate

fields.name: InteractionStatusInd
fields.comment: Status of the interaction (booked, ongoing, rescheduled, closed). partyInteraction.status

fields.name: InteractionSubStatusInd
fields.comment: Populated in case the status does not give enough information. partyInteraction.subStatus

fields.name: InteractionReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionStatusChangeDate
fields.comment: Time when the interaction status was last modified. partyInteraction.statusChangeDate

fields.name: InteractionConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: InteractionDirectionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParentInteractionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChannelFromInteractionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChannelToInteractionSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: InteractionEmail
fields.comment: Identifies the email through which interaction is done. partyInteraction.contactMedium.characteristic.emailAddress Where partyInteraction.contactMedium.mediumType = email and partyInteraction.contactMedium.preferred = true// Validate during implementation.

fields.name: InteractionTelephoneNumber
fields.comment: Identifies the phone number through which interaction is done. partyInteraction.contactMedium.characteristic.phoneNumber Where partyInteraction.contactMedium.mediumType = telephone and partyInteraction.contactMedium.preferred = true// Validate during implementation.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
